name: Margaux
tasting_note: Warmed cassis and plum notes form the core, while lilting lilac, violet and iris accents stream throughout. Offers a flash of black tea on the finish, along with a beguiling, cashmerelike mouthfeel. Judicious toast lets it all play out beautifully. A pitch-perfect example of the vintage profile. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2026 through 2040. 15,000 cases made.

name: Chardonnay Sonoma Coast UV-SL Vineyard
tasting_note: Offers a stunning mix of crème brûlée, orange curd and peach preserves, with so much depth and complexity to the range of details, including wildflower honey and apricot pastry, plus spicy accents of nutmeg and Saigon cinnamon. Toffee and a touch of smoked salt linger on the finish. Drink now through 2035. 2,357 cases made.

name: Lytton Springs Dry Creek Valley
tasting_note: Deeply structured and full of tension, this polished red displays a distinctive personality, offering bold blackberry flavors accented with savory anise, black pepper and dark Asian spices. Ends with big but refined tannins. Zinfandel, Petite Sirah, Carignane, Alicante Bouschet and Mataro. Drink now through 2035. 11,000 cases made.

name: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley Eastside Road Neighbors
tasting_note: Captures the floral-laced purity of the vintage, with a beautiful beam of boysenberry and loganberry puree flanked with light briar and apple wood notes, all set against a hibiscus-, iris- and violet-filled backdrop. The succulent energy provides a great underpinning for it all. Best from 2026 through 2040. 2,600 cases made.

name: St.-Emilion
tasting_note: This is very fresh, expressive and focused, with violet, iris and rosehip notes darting to the fore, while flavors of sleek raspberry and red currant preserves race along behind. Almost flattering, but there's a subtle chalky tension piercing the finish, which sails through. A dreamy wine. Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon. Best from 2026 through 2040. 6,250 cases made, 1,600 cases imported.

name: Apalta
tasting_note: Aromatically complex and intriguing, this offers a spiced plum pastry note that melds with petrichor, pine, dried violet and cocoa powder elements. The palate is round and richly textured, with Szechuan peppercorn accents to the concentrated black cherry, plum and cassis center. Everything comes together harmoniously on the finish and lingers, with present but integrated tannins. A stunner that should develop nicely in the cellar. Carmenère, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot. Drink now through 2040. 11,169 cases made, 1,500 cases imported.

name: Barbaresco
tasting_note: A vibrant, well-defined red, offering rose, cherry, strawberry, white pepper and mineral flavors. Sleek and elegant, this firms up on the linear finish. Balanced and approachable now yet would benefit from a bit more time to knit together. Excellent length. Best from 2027 through 2040. 24,000 cases made, 7,000 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Fort Ross-Seaview Wayfarer Vineyard The Estate
tasting_note: Offers beautifully rendered notes of hibiscus, rose petal, damson plum and mulberry that stretch out lengthily thanks to the fine-beaded acidity and taut, precise tannins. The sapid finish lets in tea and incense hints amid the glistening fruit. Best from 2026 through 2036. 1,300 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico San Lorenzo Gran Selezione
tasting_note: Deep, dark and densely wrought, featuring black cherry, blackberry, violet, iron and tobacco aromas and flavors. The sinewy tannins are enhanced by the vivid acidity, and everything comes together on the crystalline aftertaste, which echoes the fruit and floral elements. Power meets finesse. Sangiovese and Merlot. Best from 2028 through 2050. 7,715 cases made, 1,000 cases imported.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape St.-Préfert
tasting_note: Supple and mouthfilling, with silky tannins upholding cherry, plum and pretty lavender notes. Grilled garrigue plays out on the finish, which shows sneaky length and elegance. Seductive in feel, with impressive energy, too, for a balanced, harmonious impression. Grenache, Cinsault, Syrah and Mourvèdre. Drink now through 2040. 2,500 cases made, 900 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Mt. Jefferson Cuvée
tasting_note: This impressive Pinot is polished and detailed, offering dynamic flavors of raspberry and blueberry, with mineral and brown baking spice hints that build richness toward fine-grained tannins. Drink now through 2035. 11,870 cases made.

name: Bedrock Vineyard Heritage Sonoma Valley
tasting_note: This impeccably structured red is infused with personality and polish, unfolding with black cherry and raspberry flavors framed by orange peel, garrigue, brown baking spices and clove while building richness and tension toward medium-grained tannins. Zinfandel, Carignan and Mataro. Drink now through 2035. 1,200 cases made.

name: St.-Julien
tasting_note: This delivers an energetic tumble of blackberry, boysenberry and black currant paste flavors injected with bramble and apple wood and supported by a licorice snap accent. The strapping finish is laced with violet and iris notes, while a cast iron edge lends bass. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Best from 2027 through 2045. 24,000 cases made, 2,400 cases imported.

name: Chianti Classico Riserva
tasting_note: Aromas of violet and wild herbs give way to flavors of black cherry, blackberry and black currant in this tense, saturated red, which is just beginning to relax and open up now, six years after the harvest. Shows terrific balance, with a long, black pepper–infused aftertaste. Sangiovese and Merlot. Drink now through 2045. 5,000 cases made, 2,500 cases imported.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
tasting_note: An excellent example of classic Châteauneuf richness that shows good balance and energy. Juicy black raspberry, licorice and ganache are wrapped around a ballast of graphite shavings, while the refined structure reins in the warm, mouthcoating palate. Hints of grilled herbs, brown bread and lavender smoke detail the long, textured and mineral-rich finish. Grenache, Syrah, Mourvèdre and Cinsault. Best from 2026 through 2038. 5,000 cases made, 1,200 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Avni
tasting_note: Dynamic and precise, this features a core of steely acidity that frames expressive flavors of raspberry and guava, laced with crushed stone, forest floor and dusky spice notes that gather tension and richness toward fine-grained tannins. Drink now through 2033. 18,000 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico Ducale Riserva
tasting_note: There's intensity to this red, which showcases flavors of cherry, boysenberry and blood orange, with iron, underbrush and tobacco notes peeking through as this builds to the lingering aftertaste. Verges on racy courtesy of the bracing acidity, with excellent length. Sangiovese, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink now through 2040. 130,000 cases made, 90,000 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Santa Barbara County
tasting_note: This white's sleek mix of ripe pear, ginger and pomelo flavors show striking restraint, coiled around a mouthwatering thread of acidity. Details of lime zest, white peppercorn and dried tarragon linger, along with a whiff of sea spray. Drink now. 20,000 cases made.

name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
tasting_note: Capturing the essence of Willamette Valley, this Pinot is elegantly structured and vibrant with acidity yet plush and polished. Flavors of raspberry and cherry are accented by orange peel, floral tea and spices as this glides along the vibrant finish. Drink now through 2032. 10,589 cases made.

name: Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough Single Vineyard
tasting_note: Lush and intense, with mouthwatering notes of Key lime, tangerine and lemon cream. Hints of matcha, freshly grated ginger and white pepper add complexity and aromatics through the intense finish, where the flavors gain torque, power and freshness. Drink now. 6,065 cases made, 2,706 cases imported.

name: La Joie Sonoma County
tasting_note: A polished, streamlined red, with a pliant, detailed palate displaying crushed cherry, raspberry pâte de fruit and cassis purity. Layers of violet, iris and lilac float through the incredibly long finish, which is framed by ultrapolished, graphite-edged tannins. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2028 through 2050. 2,800 cases made.

name: St.-Julien
tasting_note: Very pure, with a beam of cassis pâte de fruit that powers along, picking up accents of alder, apple wood, bramble and tobacco as it goes. The finish has sneaky length, buttressed by chalky tannins that help carry the blue fruit notes. A deceptively long finish, imbued with exotic spice touches. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2030 through 2055. 14,000 cases made, 1,100 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Sonoma Coast UV Vineyard
tasting_note: A rush of plum, loganberry, cherry and mulberry flavors comes alive, while dried anise, sumac and smoked juniper accents lend bass. Fine, dense tannins lend support. This has a terrific feel, with the berry flavors lingering beautifully. Best from 2026 through 2038. 1,775 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico Riserva
tasting_note: A linear, agile red, with cherry, cranberry, mineral and underbrush flavors carried along the nervy acidity and lifted to a long finish. Vibrant, with harmonious structure. Really hits its stride on the lingering aftertaste, echoing the cherry fruit and mineral notes. Best from 2026 through 2040. 15,000 cases made, 5,800 cases imported.

name: Charmes-Chambertin
tasting_note: Offers expressive, enveloping flavors of blackberry, black cherry and raspberry pâte de fruit, infused with rose, dried violet, lilac and singed rosemary. Strapping yet refined, with suedelike tannins lining the finish. Shows floral details all through the endnote. Best from 2027 through 2045. 500 cases made, 125 cases imported.

name: Nuits-St.-Georges Clos des Forêts St.-Georges
tasting_note: Saturated, with a lovely beam of boysenberry, black raspberry and black cherry that sails along, gathering singed alder and apple wood accents while remaining fresh. Picks up rose and violet elements on the long finish, which maintains a great sense of energy. Best from 2028 through 2045. 710 cases made, 175 cases imported.

name: Pommard Les Chanlins
tasting_note: Polished and fine-grained, with a beautiful thread of blackberry, boysenberry and black cherry pâte de fruit coursing through the supple structure. Accents of violet, dried rose petal and juniper shadow the finish. This could use a few years in the cellar. Best from 2027 through 2040. 330 cases made, 80 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Sonoma Coast
tasting_note: An excellent value, this Pinot is spicy and medium-bodied, with sleek flavors of cherry, raspberry and wild strawberry that glide along with fine-grained tannins. The vibrant finish echoes spice and berry details. Drink now through 2028. 85,000 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico Tenuta di Perano Gran Selezione
tasting_note: Shows a well-defined core of cherry, strawberry and raspberry flavors, with leather, underbrush and mineral notes adding to the depth. Accented by sleek yet firm tannins, this builds to a long finish. Best from 2026 through 2045. 4,200 cases made, 900 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Oak Knoll District
tasting_note: An elegant white that offers expressive flavors of Granny Smith apple, fennel bulb, Meyer lemon and blanched almond, showing mineral and savory dried herb notes on the long, creamy finish. Drink now through 2030. 8,200 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico Riserva Sa'etta
tasting_note: Perfumed and seductive, with cherry, plum, violet and sweet tobacco aromas and flavors. There's understated intensity here, with sinewy tannins giving the midpalate a racy feel. Expands on the finish to a long aftertaste of cherry-infused herbal tea. Sangiovese and Canaiolo. Best from 2027 through 2040. 3,000 cases made, 1,000 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay California
tasting_note: Offers an inviting mix of ripe peach, juicy pear, orange zest, blanched almond and baking spice notes on a creamy, full-bodied frame. The spicy finish lingers nicely. Drink now through 2026. 400,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Vieilles Vignes
tasting_note: Sumptuous and satiny, this dark, full red is effusively layered with steeped cherry, warm cassis, licorice, fruitcake and woodsy herb notes. Hints of ganache and menthol carry through the long finish, which is supported by present but unobtrusive tannins and vibrant acidity. Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre. Drink now through 2038. 2,500 cases made, 650 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay California
tasting_note: This rich white offers a core of butter, crème brûlée, fresh peach, Granny Smith apple and almond croissant notes on a full-bodied frame. The finish is creamy, with lingering toast and butter flavor. Drink now. 1,800,000 cases made.

name: Chardonnay Napa-Carneros Estate Vineyard
tasting_note: Offers impressive depth and length, seamlessly combining ripe apricot, brioche, tangerine, caramel corn and spun honey flavors over a toasty, full-bodied frame. The baking spice– and orange curd–infused finish is beautifully long. Drink now through 2035. 1,660 cases made.

name: Chianti Classico Vigna del Sorbo Gran Selezione
tasting_note: Intense and saturated, with blackberry, mulberry, plum, violet and mineral aromas and flavors. There's a solid tannic frame holding all the saturated elements together and directing them to a long, fruit-filled aftertaste. Best from 2029 through 2050. 5,000 cases made, 1,000 cases imported.

name: Port Vintage
tasting_note: This comes right at you with its gorgeous, pure fruit, delivering dark plum, blueberry and açaí flavors over a full-bodied, satiny frame. Chocolate-covered cherry and baking spice notes take hold on the long, powerful finish. Best from 2032 through 2065. 3,000 cases made, 2,000 cases imported.

name: Zinfandel Sonoma Valley
tasting_note: Vibrant and crisp, this Zin features raspberry, pepper and spice flavors that remain light on their feet while building to a medium-grained finish. Drink now through 2030. 5,000 cases made.

name: Chardonnay Fort Ross-Seaview Wayfarer Vineyard
tasting_note: This presents a lovely mix of baked apple, lemon curd, pear pastry, clotted cream and honeycomb flavors. Picks up jasmine and a vanilla-dusted finish. A bold, hedonistic white with all the right moves, poised and pure. Drink now through 2030. 1,800 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
tasting_note: Round and openly expressive, with cherry, kirsch, raspberry and peach notes over a medium-weight frame. While generous, this strikes a nice balance with a minerally underpinning, and hints of black pepper, sage and lavender toast play out on the finish. Drinking beautifully now, this should develop for the medium term. Grenache, Mourvèdre and Syrah. Drink now through 2035. 8,000 cases made, 2,000 cases imported.

name: St.-Estèphe
tasting_note: This is gorgeously layered, with a creamy core of raspberry, boysenberry and plum pâte de fruit backed by violet and lilac notes. Graphite-edged tannins line the ultrarefined finish, which has enticing allspice, sandalwood and clove accents, leaving exotic spice and earth elements to sound out on the very back end. A wine of impeccable breeding. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2030 through 2055. 10,000 cases made, 1,100 cases imported.

name: Pomerol
tasting_note: A beautiful mix of warmed plum, boysenberry and blueberry pâte de fruit flavors leads off, with tar, bay leaf and violet accents chiming in on the fine-grained finish. The dark fruit echo lasts. Enticing drinking range. Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2026 through 2040. 5,400 cases made, 900 cases imported.

name: St.-Emilion
tasting_note: A juicy core of raspberry, red cherry and boysenberry pâte de fruit flows along effortlessly, laced with floral notes of iris and lilac. This is refined and precise, with very fine-grained tannins that let the fruit sing on the finish. A pure, evocative St.-Emilion. Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2028 through 2045. 8,000 cases made, 1,200 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Antikythera
tasting_note: Rich and refined in its flavors of cherry and black raspberry accented by tar, minerality and hints of forest floor. The dark earth tones build intrigue and tension toward fine-grained tannins. Drink now through 2035. 400 cases made.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Paso Robles
tasting_note: This Cabernet is inviting and impressive for its balance, with sleek flavors of black cherry, cassis and plum building toward spice and herb notes and firm tannins. Drink now through 2028. 20,000 cases made.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: This red is powerful and concentrated, offering aromas and flavors of black cherry, black currant, plum, violet, iron and underbrush that unfold on the lengthy finish. Resolute, with firm structure and lingering Brunello depth. Shows more complexity and nuances as it opens up. Best from 2029 through 2055. 5,000 cases made, 2,500 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Napa Valley
tasting_note: Showcases a core of pear tart, baked apple, lemon curd and honeycomb flavors over an intense, powerful frame. The savory, spiced and toasty finish carries good length. Drink now through 2032. 8,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
tasting_note: This rich red is dark in color and shows typical Beaucastel restraint in its licorice- and tobacco-laced aromas at this stage. The palate conveys cherry liqueur, kirsch and plum reduction flavors, with good density and texture, while charred herbs and umami hints play out on the fine-grained finish. A nice rendition from this estate. Mourvèdre, Grenache, Syrah and Counoise. Drink now through 2040. 13,330 cases made, 3,600 cases imported.

name: Barolo Castiglione
tasting_note: A dark, saturated red, with cherry, plum, violet and tobacco aromas and flavors. Shows refined, integrated tannins and bright acidity. Harmonious and enveloping, with a vibrant, Nebbiolo-driven aftertaste. Drink now through 2040. 14,000 cases made, 3,000 cases imported.

name: Chianti Classico
tasting_note: This saturated, nicely defined red displays plum, black cherry, tobacco and underbrush flavors, rounded off by hints of roasted espresso. Shows good balance, with the right amount of tannins, and ends with a long fruit- and spice-infused aftertaste. Sangiovese and Merlot. Drink now through 2038. 9,000 cases made, 3,500 cases imported.

name: St.-Emilion
tasting_note: Juicy and enticing, with raspberry, boysenberry and red currant flavors accented by florals of violet and lilac, plus chalky tannins that keep the finish taut. Very evocative, with lovely depth, polish and breeding. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2030 through 2055. 8,000 cases made, 1,200 cases imported.

name: Christian Moueix Napa Valley
tasting_note: Offers a delicious core of black cherry, plum and cassis pâte de fruit flavors, with anise, loam and iron accents. Fine-grained tannins provide support on the lengthy finish, which is imbued with dried herb and tobacco notes. A terrific value. Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. Drink now through 2033. 8,500 cases made.

name: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley
tasting_note: Sleek and refined, with a silky palate displaying raspberry, strawberry and cherry compote flavors laced with floral and spice accents. Picks up light tea and briar hints on the long, fine-grained finish. Best from 2026 through 2035. 2,000 cases made.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Vigneto Manachiara
tasting_note: A multidimensional, firmly structured red, with cherry, strawberry, mineral and sweet tobacco flavors. Sinewy tannins enhance the clarity and focus of the long finish, where there's outstanding aromatic persistence. Best from 2029 through 2050. 1,500 cases made, 500 cases imported.

name: Pessac-Léognan
tasting_note: This delivers a compact core of black currant, blackberry and plum pâte de fruit flavors, with wisps of lilac, violet and iris lending a heady appeal. Very refined, with fine-grained tannins and allspice, bay leaf and sandalwood notes on the back end. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Best from 2028 through 2050. 10,000 cases made, 1,100 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Sonoma Coast
tasting_note: Offers a mix of ripe apple, baked pear, Meyer lemon, grilled pineapple and crème fraîche flavors over a vibrant, medium-bodied frame. The lightly toasted, mineral-laced finish is long and graceful. Drink now through 2028. 5,000 cases made.

name: Pessac-Léognan
tasting_note: A wonderfully layered red, with a core of blackberry, boysenberry and black currant pâte de fruit backed by violet and lilac notes and shaded by singed alder. The finish is ultrapolished, with graphite and sandalwood elements lining the back end. Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Best from 2028 through 2050. 10,000 cases made, 1,000 cases imported.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: Firmly structured, with an intriguing array of black cherry, black raspberry, violet, licorice, savory herb and tar notes. Well-balanced and authoritative, with the sense that the flavors will develop in a myriad of directions given a bit of time in the cellar. Lingering finish. Best from 2027 through 2050. 8,000 cases made, 2,500 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley Estate
tasting_note: Features supple raspberry, strawberry and cherry compote flavors that ease along, backed by floral notes of rose petal and violet. Fine-grained tannins shape the long, refined finish. Drink now through 2035. 3,500 cases made.

name: Pinot Noir Sta. Rita Hills Bloom's Field
tasting_note: Sleek and refined, with a silky core of raspberry, cherry and strawberry pâte de fruit flavors laced with rose and violet notes. The long finish features ultrapolished tannins and vibrant acidity. Best from 2025 through 2035. 900 cases made.

name: Barolo
tasting_note: This Barolo offers a fine mix of cherry, raspberry, violet and rose flavors, with underbrush and sweet tobacco notes peeking through. Elegant and agile, with sleek tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink now through 2040. 30,000 cases made, 6,500 cases imported.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Elisabeth Chambellan
tasting_note: Bright and fresh, with cherry, raspberry and black pepper notes over a silky, medium-bodied frame. Pretty florals weave through, with licorice and garrigue hints on the finish. A charming, fresh and energetic style. Grenache and Syrah. Drink now through 2035. 1,250 cases made, 400 cases imported.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
tasting_note: A polished Cabernet, with a core of black cherry, cassis and plum pâte de fruit flavors laced with vanilla, cedar and toast accents. Plush tannins shape the long, fruit-driven finish. Drink now through 2032. 65,000 cases made.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: Polished and detailed, with cherry, plum, violet, leather and mineral aromas and flavors. Shows refined tannins and good acidity, coming together on a long, complex finish. Sangiovese Grosso. Best from 2027 through 2045. 20,000 cases made, 7,000 cases imported.

name: Pomerol
tasting_note: A sleek, polished red, with a beam of raspberry, strawberry and cherry pâte de fruit laced with violet and iris notes. Fine-grained tannins line the long finish, which echoes the fruit and floral notes. Best from 2028 through 2045. 2,500 cases made, 300 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Sonoma Mountain McCrea Vineyard
tasting_note: Offers a gorgeous core of baked apple, Meyer lemon, brioche and honeycomb flavors over an intense, full-bodied frame. The long, savory finish displays lingering mineral and toast notes. Drink now through 2032. 700 cases made.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: Offers an alluring mix of cherry, plum, violet, iron and earthy notes. The tannins are sleek yet firm, lending structure to the long, flavor-packed finish. Best from 2027 through 2045. 3,300 cases made, 1,200 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Livermore Valley Morning Fog
tasting_note: This vibrant white offers crisp flavors of pear, apple, citrus and light tropical fruit over a medium-bodied frame. The clean, refreshing finish shows hints of toast and vanilla. Drink now. 125,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Réserve
tasting_note: Full and concentrated, with steeped cherry, black raspberry, licorice and ganache flavors over a satiny, full-bodied frame. The finish is warm and expansive, with lingering notes of spiced plum and garrigue. Grenache, Syrah, Mourvèdre and Cinsault. Drink now through 2038. 2,200 cases made, 800 cases imported.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: Offers well-defined cherry, raspberry, rose and mineral flavors, with tobacco and underbrush notes adding depth. The tannins are integrated, and the finish is long. Best from 2027 through 2045. 6,000 cases made, 2,500 cases imported.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
tasting_note: A polished, well-structured Cabernet, with a core of black cherry, cassis and plum pâte de fruit flavors laced with cedar, tobacco and dried herb accents. Firm tannins shape the long finish. Drink now through 2033. 8,500 cases made.

name: Chardonnay Russian River Ranches
tasting_note: A fresh and vibrant Chardonnay, with flavors of apple, pear, citrus and light tropical fruit over a medium-bodied frame. The clean finish shows hints of mineral and light toast. Drink now. 350,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
tasting_note: Fresh and vibrant, with cherry, raspberry and black pepper notes over a medium-bodied frame. Florals weave through, with garrigue and mineral hints on the finish. A classic, balanced style. Grenache and Syrah. Drink now through 2035. 6,000 cases made, 1,500 cases imported.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: This is well-balanced, with cherry, strawberry, violet and tobacco aromas and flavors. The tannins are polished and the acidity is bright, leading to a long, fruity finish. Drink now through 2040. 65,000 cases made, 40,000 cases imported.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
tasting_note: Offers a polished core of black cherry, cassis and plum pâte de fruit flavors, with cedar, graphite and dried herb accents. Fine-grained tannins shape the long, refined finish. Drink now through 2035. 24,000 cases made.

name: Port Vintage
tasting_note: Dense and powerful, with dark plum, blueberry, cassis and chocolate flavors over a full-bodied, concentrated frame. The finish is long and tannic. Best from 2035 through 2070. 5,000 cases made, 2,000 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley
tasting_note: Offers a silky palate with raspberry, cherry and strawberry flavors laced with floral and spice accents. The long, fine-grained finish displays hints of tea and briar. Best from 2025 through 2035. 5,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Les Saintes Vierges
tasting_note: Rich and concentrated, with steeped cherry, plum and licorice flavors over a satiny, full-bodied frame. The finish is warm and expansive, with lingering notes of garrigue and chocolate. Grenache, Mourvèdre and Syrah. Drink now through 2040. 800 cases made, 300 cases imported.

name: Pinot Grigio Friuli Colli Orientali
tasting_note: A fresh, vibrant white with flavors of pear, apple, citrus and white flowers over a medium-bodied frame. The clean, refreshing finish shows hints of mineral. Drink now. 15,000 cases made.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
tasting_note: A polished, well-structured Cabernet, with a core of black cherry, cassis and plum flavors laced with cedar, tobacco and dried herb accents. Firm tannins shape the long finish. Drink now through 2033. 25,000 cases made.

name: Barolo Albe
tasting_note: A well-defined red, with cherry, raspberry, rose, violet and mineral flavors. Shows refined tannins and good acidity, leading to a long finish. Drink now through 2038. 7,000 cases made, 2,500 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Napa Valley
tasting_note: Offers a mix of ripe apple, baked pear, Meyer lemon and crème fraîche flavors over a vibrant, full-bodied frame. The toasty finish carries good length. Drink now through 2028. 50,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Vieilles Vignes
tasting_note: Concentrated and full-bodied, with steeped cherry, plum, licorice and chocolate flavors. The finish is warm and expansive, with lingering notes of garrigue and spice. Grenache, Mourvèdre and Syrah. Drink now through 2038. 600 cases made, 200 cases imported.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: A classic Brunello, with cherry, strawberry, tobacco and leather aromas and flavors. The tannins are firm and the acidity is bright, leading to a long finish. Drink now through 2040. 30,000 cases made, 10,000 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Sonoma Coast
tasting_note: Sleek and refined, with a silky core of raspberry, cherry and strawberry flavors laced with rose and tea notes. The long finish features ultrapolished tannins. Best from 2025 through 2032. 2,500 cases made.

name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Evenstad Reserve
tasting_note: A polished Pinot, with a silky palate displaying raspberry, cherry and strawberry flavors laced with floral and spice accents. The long, fine-grained finish is elegant. Drink now through 2032. 10,000 cases made.

name: St.-Estèphe
tasting_note: Delivers a dense core of cassis, blackberry and boysenberry pâte de fruit, backed by graphite, tar and violet notes. The finish is long and structured, with fine-grained tannins. Best from 2030 through 2055. 16,000 cases made, 1,500 cases imported.

name: Barolo
tasting_note: A refined red, with cherry, raspberry, rose, violet and mineral flavors. Shows sleek tannins and good acidity, leading to a long finish. Drink now through 2038. 6,000 cases made, 2,000 cases imported.

name: Port Vintage
tasting_note: Dense and powerful, with dark plum, blueberry, cassis and chocolate flavors over a full-bodied, concentrated frame. The finish is long and tannic. Best from 2035 through 2070. 3,500 cases made, 1,500 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Sonoma Coast
tasting_note: A fresh and vibrant Chardonnay, with flavors of apple, pear, citrus and light tropical fruit over a medium-bodied frame. The clean finish shows hints of mineral and light toast. Drink now. 200,000 cases made.

name: Pauillac
tasting_note: Delivers a dense core of cassis, blackberry and boysenberry flavors backed by graphite and tar notes. The finish is long and structured. Best from 2030 through 2055. 18,000 cases made, 1,800 cases imported.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley Artemis
tasting_note: A polished Cabernet, with a core of black cherry, cassis and plum flavors laced with cedar and dried herb accents. Firm tannins shape the long finish. Drink now through 2033. 35,000 cases made.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
tasting_note: A classic Brunello, with cherry, strawberry, tobacco and leather aromas and flavors. The tannins are firm and the acidity is bright, leading to a long finish. Drink now through 2040. 25,000 cases made, 8,000 cases imported.

name: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley
tasting_note: Offers a silky palate with raspberry, cherry and strawberry flavors laced with floral and spice accents. The long, fine-grained finish displays hints of tea. Best from 2025 through 2033. 2,000 cases made.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape La Crau
tasting_note: Full and concentrated, with steeped cherry, black raspberry, licorice and ganache flavors over a satiny, full-bodied frame. The finish is warm and expansive, with lingering notes of garrigue and spice. Grenache, Mourvèdre, Syrah and Cinsault. Drink now through 2040. 10,000 cases made, 3,000 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Carneros
tasting_note: A rich white, with butter, crème brûlée, fresh peach, apple and almond notes on a full-bodied frame. The finish is creamy, with lingering toast and butter flavor. Drink now. 175,000 cases made.

name: Pessac-Léognan
tasting_note: Delivers a compact core of black currant, blackberry and plum flavors, with wisps of lilac and violet. Very refined, with fine-grained tannins. Best from 2028 through 2050. 9,000 cases made, 900 cases imported.

name: Barolo
tasting_note: A refined red, with cherry, raspberry, rose, violet and mineral flavors. Shows sleek tannins and good acidity, leading to a long finish. Drink now through 2038. 7,500 cases made, 3,000 cases imported.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Alexander Valley
tasting_note: A polished Cabernet, with a core of black cherry, cassis and plum flavors laced with cedar, tobacco and dried herb accents. Firm tannins shape the long finish. Drink now through 2033. 65,000 cases made.

name: Chardonnay Santa Lucia Highlands Reserve
tasting_note: Offers a mix of ripe apple, baked pear, Meyer lemon and crème fraîche flavors over a vibrant, full-bodied frame. The toasty finish carries good length. Drink now through 2028. 15,000 cases made.
